downloadDescription: Read about how the advanced diagramming tools in Visio 2010 can help you organize and simplify business process complexity and share on the web in real time.
detailsSection: Read about how the new tools and more intuitive interface in Microsoft Visio 2010 make it easier for business and IT users to map processes and share business insight across the organization—whether you’re capturing existing business processes, analyzing your supply chain, or monitoring business process performance. This document highlights how you can simplify business process complexity with pre-defined process templates, subprocesses, dynamic diagrams, and real-time web sharing with Visio Services.
installInstructionSection: Download the document by clicking in "DOWNLOAD" button (above).
